channel.title: Scorned shouldn't win lynching a converted target
channel.description: Title. its just not fun to be scorned when you target is actually evil and gets voted. Make it so that if your targets are either killed or converted, you commit suicide.

item.title: Scorned shouldn't win lynching a converted target
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
Eh, I don’t like sacrificing good gameplay for lore reasons in a game like this. It’d be easy to rework the story/lore to make it fit.

Read full topic
item.source: Scorned shouldn't win lynching a converted target

item.title: Scorned shouldn't win lynching a converted target
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
The flavour of the class is that you are so mad at two courtiers, you will do anything to see at least one punished for killing a loved one. You want to see at least one of them declared a traitor and die. That’s all that gives your life meaning. You can’t get a substitute for your revenge just because…

Read full topic
item.source: Scorned shouldn't win lynching a converted target

item.title: Scorned shouldn't win lynching a converted target
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
It’d be nice if your two scorned targets die at night that you get a new one.

It sucks if RNG gets your contracts killed early on and you have nothing left to do.

Read full topic
item.source: Scorned shouldn't win lynching a converted target

item.title: Scorned shouldn't win lynching a converted target
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Pfft, targets that are converted helps Scorned even more, after all the goal is to survive long enough to see your targets executed.

Simple as that.

Read full topic
item.source: Scorned shouldn't win lynching a converted target

item.title: Scorned shouldn't win lynching a converted target
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
they would need an ability that makes one of their targets immune to conversion at night

but that will make it too hard for evils

definitely not
because then you are “confirmed” and can totally mess with the bd
